overview: Graeme has always worked in internet industries since 1996. He has developed the first french students portal, named Study.fr, in 1999. Then, he created in 2000 his firt company, GeoCompagnie.com, wich was the France leading outdoors and travel kits BtoC website. When he sell it in 2001, he went to Canada for personal reasons. In Canada, he worked as a ecommerce consultant for years, and he created some websites too, such as PopulationData.net, the leading site about human and geographic sciences in the french internet. Back to France in 2009, he is developing a new company, MondeCafÃ©s, a community local guide for going out.
